== Athletics ==
== Athletics ==
â
+
[[Image:IndianaUSouthBendSpiritMark.jpg|thumb|right|Athletics logo]]
[[Image:IUSBBasketball.JPG|thumb|right|150 px|]]
[[Image:IUSBBasketball.JPG|thumb|right|150 px|]]
The [[National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics|NAIA]] Division I Women's [[Basketball]] team qualified for the national tournament in 2005, winning the [[Chicagoland Collegiate Athletic Conference]] (CCAC). Former Head Coach [[Mary Wisniewski]] (214-135, .630) was voted CCAC Coach of the Year for the sixth time in 10 years by her peers. Wisniewski won the award in 94-95, 96-97, 97-98, 98-99, 00-01, and 04-05. Seniors Jamie Bonner and Emily Ladd earned 1st Team All-CCAC honors for the second straight year and freshmen Jessica Hass and Jennifer VanderZanden earned Honorable Mention All-CCAC honors.
The [[National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics|NAIA]] Division I Women's [[Basketball]] team qualified for the national tournament in 2005, winning the [[Chicagoland Collegiate Athletic Conference]] (CCAC). Former Head Coach [[Mary Wisniewski]] (214-135, .630) was voted CCAC Coach of the Year for the sixth time in 10 years by her peers. Wisniewski won the award in 94-95, 96-97, 97-98, 98-99, 00-01, and 04-05. Seniors Jamie Bonner and Emily Ladd earned 1st Team All-CCAC honors for the second straight year and freshmen Jessica Hass and Jennifer VanderZanden earned Honorable Mention All-CCAC honors.
